Name: Astronomia
About the game: Astronomia is a spatial 3D puzzle game with a minimalist classic arcade art style. Guide the ball around each level to clear every fragment block and unlock the goal . Bonk, sling, and warp your way around 25 levels . Missteps are easily undone with the ability to undo any number of your previous moves, or simply restart the level from the beginning. A fun brain-teaser for casual and hardcore puzzlers alike!
